flawed_nl_solution:
He needs to walk 63000 steps in a week because 7 x 9000 = <<7*9000=63000>>63000
He has 1810 steps to walk on Friday and Saturday because 63000 - 9400 - 9100 - 8300 - 9200 - 8900 = <<63000-9400-9100-8300-9200-8900=1810>>1810
He needs to walk an average of 905 on Friday and Saturday because 1810 / 2 = <<1810/2=905>>905
#### 905

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 18100, not 1810. It appears a zero was dropped from the number.
